mapper.select: select vi.subject_id, any_value(vi.subject_number) subject_number, max(vi.voucher_number) voucher_number, sum(vi.local_debit_amount) local_debit_amount, sum(vi.local_credit_amount) local_credit_amount from voucher_item vi where vi.year_month_num = #{yearMonthNum} group by vi.subject_id

select vi.subject_id, any_value(vi.subject_number) subject_number, max(vi.voucher_number) voucher_number, sum(vi.local_debit_amount) local_debit_amount, sum(vi.local_credit_amount) local_credit_amount from voucher_item vi where vi.year_month_num = #{yearMonthNum} and vi.currency_name = #{currencyName} group by vi.subject_id
